quotes.quote: When we remember we are all mad, the mysteries disappear and life stands explained.
I'm a damsel, I'm in distress, I can handle this.
Live. Love. Smile. Hug. Laugh. Dream. Do. Create. Have fun. Be intense. Be audacious. Be unreasonable. Act impeccably. Breathe. Be you. Be different.
If you have something about yourself that's different, you're lucky. It's not a curse.
Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius, and it's better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring.
When I'm good, I'm very good. But when I'm bad I'm better.
Always borrow money from a pessimist. He won't expect it back.
True courage comes not just from feeling confident and strong, but from being the honest, authentic expression in yourself. Think about how audacious it is to really believe in yourself.
If you obey all the rules, you miss all the fun.
It is better to be high-spirited even though one makes more mistakes, than to be narrow-minded and all too prudent.
A woman is like a tea bag â€“ you never know how strong she is until she gets in hot water.
Perfect simplicity is unconsciously audacious.
Never ask a girl with winged eyeliner why she's late.
The wings of one's greatest glory unfold when the heart and body are uninhibited.
I don't care what you think about me; I don't think about you at all!
You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
I do not want people to be agreeable, as it saves me that trouble of liking them.
Someday I want to be perfect; until then, I'll be happy being incredible.
I've learned that you shouldn't go through life with a catcher's mitt on both hands; you need to be able to throw something back.
Go wild and let go. Usually the most audacious ideas are the ones that get noticed.
The most courageous act is still to think for yourself. Aloud.
Be an individual, let out the self that hides away at the expense of others approval.
If you retain nothing else, always remember the most important rule of beauty, which is: who cares?
To be audacious with tact, you have to know to what point you can go too far.
Some cause happiness wherever they go; others whenever they go.
The high-spirited man may indeed die, but he will not stoop to meanness. Fire, though it may be quenched, will not become cool.
The art of being sometimes audacious and sometimes very prudent is the secret of success.
If you're sad, add more lipstick and attack. Men hate women who weep.
The most fearless hearts, the audacious dreamers, have always maintained a sense of optimism that often flies in the face of the available evidence.
A lot of people are afraid to say what they want. That's why they don't get what they want.
